mapper.select: SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont7,mem_cont3,num FROM (SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont7,mem_cont3,ROWNUM as num FROM (SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont7,mem_cont3 FROM chef ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM chef ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM=1
SELECT no,poster,title,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT no,poster,title FROM recipe ORDER BY no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=5

SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount,num FROM (SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount,ROWNUM as num FROM (SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount FROM recipe ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
